DOC.brief_summary: This 2-arm , open-label , non-randomized study investigate absolute bioavailability , pharmacokinetics , mass balance , rout elimination GDC-0032 well safety healthy volunteer . Patients receive either single oral dose GDC-0032 follow 14C-labeled IV dose GDC-0032 single oral dose 14C-labelled GDC-0032 .
DOC.brief_title: A Bioavailability Pharmacokinetic Study GDC-0032 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18 32 kg/m2 , inclusive ; Healthy , judge physician medical history , 12lead ECG , vital sign , clinical laboratory evaluation ; Agree use effective contraceptive method define protocol ; Negative hepatitis panel HIV screen ; Sufficient bowel movement ( minimum 1 per day ) . History clinical manifestation : major medical disorder ; food/drug/substance allergy ; History stomach intestinal surgery resection except appendectomy and/or hernia repair ; History alcoholism drug addiction within 1 year prior drug administration ; Tobacco nicotine use within 6 month prior study start ; Chronic use gastric acid inhibitor within 6 month study start use gastric acid inhibitor and/or antacid within 1 month prior drug administration ; Evidence malabsorption syndrome condition interfere gastrointestinal absorption ; Inability unwillingness swallow capsule ; Participation drug study drug administer within 30 day prior study start ; Participation one radiolabeled drug study within 12 month precede drug administration . The previous radiolabeled study drug must receive 6 month prior study , total exposure study previous study less 5000 mrem whole body annual exposure ; Exposure significant radiation within 12 month prior study start .
